name: Grassy Glide
description: You glide on the ground to strike a target. Make a melee attack, doing 1d8 + MOVE grass damage on a hit.
If you are on Grassy Terrain when this move is used, then until the start of your next turn you gain an additional 10ft of movement, and your movement no longer provokes attacks of opportunity.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
